project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API.

task.name: Research a public weather API and gather documentation for usage
Implement the API integration to fetch current weather data based on the provided city
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal
Write tests for the API fetching and data parsing functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
